subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Blake Sims passed for 268 yards and three touchdowns and scored on a 43-yard run while leading the No. 7 Crimson Tide to 35 second-quarter points and a pummeling of the No. 21 Aggies on Saturday.
snippet: Blake Sims passed for 268 yards and three touchdowns and scored on a 43-yard run while leading the No. 7 Crimson Tide to 35 second-quarter points and a pummeling of the No. 21 Aggies on Saturday.
